articles.title: ​New COVID variant NB.1.8.1 behind surge in cases recently: Symptoms associated with it​ - Times of India
articles.description: As of May 2025, a new COVID-19 variant, NB.1.8.1, is making headlines globally. Emerging as a subvariant of the Omicron lineage JN.1, NB.1.8.1 has been linked to recent surges in cases across Asia and has now been detected in the United States. While health a…
articles.content:
The symptoms of NB.1.8.1 are largely consistent with those of previous Omicron variants. Commonly reported symptoms include:
Sore throat
Fatigue
Mild cough
Fever
Muscle aches
Congestion
